name: Messi(ENGLISH)
author: Luca Caioli
description: Lionel Andres Messi is a name to inspire and awe people. In this book, Caioli Luca draws on official interviews, testimonies from parents, family, friends, coaches, team-mates, opponents and Messi himself to spin the tale of the man who was known as the Machine of '87 for his skill at the game.
